sarkas.thermostats.thermostat module¶

Module containing various thermostat. Berendsen only for now.

sarkas.thermostats.thermostat.Berendsen(vel, T_desired, T, species_np, therm_timestep, tau, it)[source]¶

Update particle velocity based on Berendsen thermostat [Berendsen1984].

Parameters

  • T (array) – Instantaneous temperature of each species.

  • vel (array) – Particles’ velocities to rescale.

  • T_desired (array) – Target temperature of each species.

  • tau (float) – Scale factor.

  • therm_timestep (int) – Timestep at which to turn on the thermostat.

  • species_np (array) – Number of each species.

  • it (int) – Current timestep.

References

Berendsen1984

H.J.C. Berendsen et al., J Chem Phys 81 3684 (1984)

sarkas.thermostats.thermostat.calc_kin_temp(vel, nums, masses, kB)[source]¶

Calculates the kinetic energy and temperature.

Parameters

  • kB (float) – Boltzmann constant in chosen units.

  • masses (array) – Mass of each species.

  • nums (array) – Number of particles of each species.

  • vel (array) – Particles’ velocities.

Returns

  • K (array) – Kinetic energy of each species.

  • T (array) – Temperature of each species.
